basics.name: Riley Herradura
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a focus in the Security Science track at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2028.

work.summary: Continuation of MC3 Technologies internship under UH Manoaâ€™s Leap-Start Program.
highlights: Provided IT services for clients including networking support and device setup
Partnered with Puea Learning Center to offer a free cybersecurity/IT course for underserved students
Helped design, develop, and moderate a Discord server for course engagement and support

work.summary: Remote internship supporting cybersecurity risk assessment and training.
highlights: Assisted in identifying and mitigating cybersecurity risks within organizations
Participated in cybersecurity training sessions to stay current on industry trends and developments
Helped develop a custom GPT to assist with cyber assessments

volunteer.summary: Supported project management and coordination for a multi-team drone development initiative.
highlights: Assisted in daily scrums and sprint planning sessions using Agile project management methods
Managed Microsoft Planner boards to track tasks, blockers, and deadlines across 8 student teams
Coordinated communication between teams to ensure project deliverables remained aligned and on schedule
Presented the drone project at the Pacific Impact Zone to community members and industry attendees

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Merit-based scholarship awarded for academic achievement as an incoming student at the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

awards.title: NMSI STEM STAR Student Award
awards.summary: Recognized for excellence and achievement in STEM coursework during high school.
